scripts.postinstall: npm run app-install && npm run electron-version
scripts.electron-version: cd build && node -e "var electron = require('../node_modules/electron-prebuilt/package.json'); console.log(electron.version);" > electron.version
scripts.babel-build: babel --presets es2015,react --ignore node_modules/ --compact true --source-maps true --extensions .jsx app/ -d app/
scripts.build:prepare: npm run clean && npm run app-install && npm run babel-build && npm run electron-version
scripts.build:linux: npm run clean:build && npm run build:linux-ia32 -s && npm run build:linux-x64 -s
scripts.build:linux-ia32: npm run build:prepare && npm run rebuild:bash-ia32 && npm run package:linux-ia32 && npm run setup:linux-ia32
scripts.build:linux-x64: npm run build:prepare && npm run rebuild:bash-x64 && npm run package:linux-x64 && npm run setup:linux-x64
scripts.build:osx: npm run clean:build && npm run build:osx-app -s && npm run build:osx-mas -s
scripts.build:osx-app: npm run build:prepare && npm run rebuild:bash-x64 && npm run package:osx-app && npm run setup:osx-dmg
scripts.build:osx-mas: npm run build:prepare && npm run rebuild:bash-x64 && npm run package:osx-mas && npm run setup:osx-mas
scripts.build:win32: npm run clean:build && npm run build:win32-ia32 -s && npm run build:win32-x64 -s
scripts.build:win32-ia32: npm run build:prepare && npm run rebuild:win32-ia32 && npm run package:win32-ia32 && npm run setup:win32-ia32
scripts.build:win32-x64: npm run build:prepare && npm run rebuild:win32-x64 && npm run package:win32-x64 && npm run setup:win32-x64
scripts.rebuild: npm run rebuild:bash -s || npm run rebuild:win32 -s
scripts.rebuild:bash: export ELECTRON_VERSION=$(cat build/electron.version) && cd app/node_modules/leveldown && node-gyp rebuild --target=$ELECTRON_VERSION --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell && mv build/Release/leveldown.node build/ && rimraf build/Release
scripts.rebuild:bash-ia32: export ELECTRON_VERSION=$(cat build/electron.version) && cd app/node_modules/leveldown && node-gyp rebuild --target=$ELECTRON_VERSION --arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell && mv build/Release/leveldown.node build/ && rimraf build/Release
scripts.rebuild:bash-x64: export ELECTRON_VERSION=$(cat build/electron.version) && cd app/node_modules/leveldown && node-gyp rebuild --target=$ELECTRON_VERSION --arch=x64 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell && mv build/Release/leveldown.node build/ && rimraf build/Release
scripts.rebuild:win32: SET /P ELECTRON_VERSION=<build/electron.version && cd app/node_modules/leveldown && node-gyp rebuild --target=%ELECTRON_VERSION% --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell && copy build\Release\leveldown.node build && rimraf build/Release
scripts.rebuild:win32-ia32: SET /P ELECTRON_VERSION=<build/electron.version && cd app/node_modules/leveldown && node-gyp rebuild --target=%ELECTRON_VERSION% --arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell && copy build\Release\leveldown.node build && rimraf build/Release
scripts.rebuild:win32-x64: SET /P ELECTRON_VERSION=<build/electron.version && cd app/node_modules/leveldown && node-gyp rebuild --target=%ELECTRON_VERSION% --arch=x64 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell && copy build\Release\leveldown.node build && rimraf build/Release
scripts.setup:linux-ia32: electron-installer-debian --src build/Boilerplate-linux-ia32/ --dest dist/ --arch ia32 --config package-linux.json && electron-installer-redhat --src build/Boilerplate-linux-ia32/ --dest dist/ --arch ia32 --config package-linux.json
scripts.setup:linux-x64: electron-installer-debian --src build/Boilerplate-linux-x64/ --dest dist/ --arch amd64 --config package-linux.json && electron-installer-redhat --src build/Boilerplate-linux-x64/ --dest dist/ --arch amd64 --config package-linux.json
